comment.author: 34353497@N08
comment._content:
Norwegian modern spelling "Oppheimsvannet" or "Oppheimsvatnet". On Google Maps spelt "Uppeimsvatnet". 

This is a lake in the mountains on the way from Voss over to Sogn, and it's not really close to the Hardangerfjord.

comment.author: 7503937@N04
comment._content: Belongs to Voss kommune (municipality), and is as vyxir says closer to Sognefjorden (The Sognefjord) and its arm Nærøyfjorden (The Naeroey fjord).

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: vyxir and arnybo, thank you for this information! We will correct the source data and reload the description.
